text: Poltergeist is a 1982 American horror movie set in Orange County, California. It was directed by Tobe Hooper. It stars Craig T. Nelson, JoBeth Wiliams, Beatrice Straight, Dominique Dunne, Oliver Robins, Richard Lawson and Heather O'Rourke. It was followed by two sequels: Poltergeist II: The Other Side and Poltergeist III. It was remade in 2015. == Other websites == * Category:1982 horror movies Category:1980s ghost movies Category:American ghost movies Category:Supernatural horror movies Category:BAFTA Award winning movies Category:1980s English-language movies Category:Haunted house movies Category:Movies about suburbia Category:Movies composed by Jerry Goldsmith Category:Movies set in California Category:Orange County, California
title: Poltergeist (1982 movie)
